sub_title: Senior System Analyst / Senior Business Analyst
summary:
Hey, I'm a Senior Business/System Analyst with a deep background in system analysis as well as in business analysis.

I have a strong experience in fintech and insurance domains, mentorship and I do enjoy my work and constantly try to self-develop :) I love to discover new domains, tasks and areas of knowledge and new responsibilities don't frighten me. 

I have a lovely husband and a cute doggy. I’m into a healthy style and workouts, they help me to feel perfect. I’m an adherent of selective waste collection and as I love pets, I try to do as much charity as I can through donations to pets’ shelters. 
Sometimes I’m a bit of a perfectionist but I’m working on myself and doing my best not to be annoying in my perfectionism :D

profile_positions.title: Information Analyst

profile_positions.description:
https://otus.ru/teacher/2518/ - link on my profile in Russian

OTUS is a company of online education who offers different IT courses for beginners, middles and seniors. 

I am a mentor on 2 courses of System Analysis - for beginners ("System Analyst. Basic") and middles ("System Analyst. Advanced").

As the mentor of the course "System Analyst. Advanced" I have these responsibilities:
- checking students’ homeworks,
- giving feedback on homeworks, 
- written consultations about homeworks.

As the mentor of the course "System Analyst. Basic" I have the same responsibilities as for the previous one and additionally mentorship and Zoom consultations about homeworks.

This job is additional to my main activities.
profile_positions.title: Student Mentor

profile_positions.description:
MTS Bank is one of the biggest commercial banks of Russia.
My projects are:
- an online platform for Private Banking clients (it was implemented as PWA – progressive web application)
- an application process for premium clients

The purposes of projects are:
- to give our clients opportunities for passing an online onboarding processes (using online forms and documents’ recognition)
- to give our clients opportunities for buying premium products online
- to provide our clients with premium services and individual channels for assets management which are not available for them through the common app
- to build such a product that could be unique all over Russian banks

Achievements:
- MVP release within 6 months from scratch
- Extension of investment products
- Integration with the bank’s partners and start of partners’ sales through our app
- Launch of the application process for premium clients via the bank's website

My responsibilities are:
- Participation in architecture development
- Forming of the navigation scheme of the PWA 
- Elaboration of system integrations
- Gathering customer requirements
- Forming of business processes diagrams (AS IS and TO BE) 
- Forming of FRs and specifications for system integrations 
- Forming of templates for the project documentation 
- Manual testing, including forming and documentation of test cases
- Risks and juridical restrictions analysis
- API design
- Release planning and making considerable decisions that have influence on the product
profile_positions.title: Senior System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Sberbank is one of the Top-3 banks of Russia. 
My project was development of iOS and web apps for Private Banking clients (they were supposed to be the wealthiest clients of the bank).

The purposes of this project were:
- creating an individual online channel for PB clients because they hadn’t had it before our app was released,
- consolidation of bank, investment and trust management assets in one app,
- opportunity to make different operations via the app, e.g. trading or bank transfers

Achievements:
- Building the app from scratch 
- MVP release for its’ using among inner PB clients (bank management and loyal PB clients)
- Head of department’s award for good job and help in API testing (yeah, I had been testing the app and APIs for some time until we found QA)
- Hiring a few successful candidates for QA's and analyst's positions

My responsibilities were:
- Gathering of business requirements
- Immersion in the investment domain
- Documentation of FRs and integration specifications
- Participation in all stages of the product life cycle, architecture design, forming of requirements for the development team, manual testing
- Participation in acceptance testing
- Forming of OpenAPI specs
- Participation in UI design development
- Participation in creating work processes for effective teamwork (JIRA dashboard and Scrum board settings)
- REST API design and testing
- Participation in adaptation of new teammates
- Job interviews with candidates (analysts and QAs)
profile_positions.title: Senior System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Naumen is not a large company developing its own decisions and integrating them into customers’ infrastructure.
My project was a corporate search system. A customer was one of the largest companies in the oil production sphere. The search system was intended to be used by employers. It allowed them to search for necessary information among inner and outer sources (corporate systems, online magazines, web-sites, etc.).
My career in Naumen wasn’t very long because I didn’t see career opportunities there and responsibilities were quite boring, also my director wasn’t interested in my growth.

Achievements:
- creation and development of a search crawler for outer information sources
- adding new inner information sources in the corporate search system

My responsibilities were:
- Support and development of the corporate search system for the customer
- Release planning with the customer
- Elaboration of requirements from emergence of ideas to specifications for developers (backend and frontend)
- Analysis of integrations with outer information sources (via REST API, SOAP)
- Requirements documentation
- API testing via Postman
- Acceptance testing
profile_positions.title: System analyst

profile_positions.description:
Renaissance Insurance is one of the largest insurance companies in Russia.
My project was creation and development of a new insurance product for property insurance. Due to it, customers could insure their apartments and houses from different type of risks.
All insurance products were developed on the custom flexible platform that had been created to satisfy all business needs.

Achievements:
Development and launch of the new product for property insurance from scratch

My responsibilities were:
- Work with tasks for development of the platform and inner business instruments
- Close interaction with business customers
- Development and alignment of product vision with Product Owner
- Coordination of the development team
- Architecture design for a new product
- Forming of test cases for tests of a system layer
- Requirements documentation using Git and Confluence
- Elaboration of User Stories and Acceptance Criterias and transformation business requirements to functional requirements
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Tinkoff development center is a company created for resolving tasks of Tinkoff Group (it includes a bank, a mobile operator, an insurance company and others).
My project was support and development of Oracle Siebel CRM for the needs of Tinkoff Mobile (the mobile operator).
Also I participated in a project of a new CRM creation (the company planned to create and develop its own CRM).

Achievements:
- Participation in development of client service processes in a new CRM
- Conducting successful internships (I was a mentor and a curator of junior analysts)

My responsibilities were:
- Development and support of Oracle Siebel CRM for Tinkoff Mobile (the mobile operator)
- Gathering requirements, setting tasks and elaboration on architectural solutions for CRM
- Setting tasks for related systems and elaboration on integrations
- Participation in development of new Tinkoff’s CRM and its’ adaptation to Tinkoff Mobile
- Release planning, tasks prioritization, team coordination
- Conducting internships for junior specialists: preparation of an internships’ plan, interviews with candidates, observation of juniors work and any assistance
- Analysis of incidents from back-office staff and first line support staff
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
EPAM is a huge international company.
It was my first company where I could grow from an intern to an upper-middle analyst. 
But if I hadn’t left the company, I wouldn’t have been who I am now. I’m very grateful to the company for my growth.
My projects were for one customer who was one of the largest insurance companies in Russia.
They were:
-Development and support of a system for partner sales
-Development and support of common API for all consumers
-Development and support of an interface for underwriters
-Creation of a personal account function on a portal for sales of transport leftovers
-Development and support of the company’s website and its products
-Creation of a functionality for online sales of obligatory insurance policies (for corporate customers)

Achievements:
- implementation of the user interface and API for underwriters
- implementation of new products: leasing for business and voluntary insurance for business
- implementation of the functionality for online sales of obligatory insurance policies (for corporate customers): personal accounts for corporate managers and customers
- API implementation for pre-insurance examination (in mobile app)
- transferring API used in insurance partner products to common API
- arrangements of meet-ups and analytical events within EPAM offices
- mentorship
- participation in local assessments (for Junior to Middle analysts) as an expert

My responsibilities were:
- Analysts' team lead
- Gathering requirements from business customers
- Forming of business and functional requirements
- Business process modelling (using BPMN notation), UML modelling, wireframes modelling
- Requirements management using JIRA and Confluence
- Team support
- Tasks coordination
- Risks management
- Planning workload of other analysts in the team
- System analysis
- Forming of integration specs and description of web-services
- Teaching and interviewing junior analysts
- Conducting job interviews
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst
